Name: Wheels Cafe
Review Text: Great little place on a side street in Amsterdam. Food is excellent, breakfast, brunch, and dinner. Staff is super friendly! A neat touch : they use rugs as table clothes and it makes the place very cozy. Also nice people watching spot, especially when the weather is nice. We live around the corner and we will definitely be back.

Name: Wheels Cafe
Review Text: great place for familyâ€™s. i loved the food and the staff was wonderful. they talked to us like we were people and not just customers! great place to just stop in and have a bite of delicious food with your family while walking the streets of amsterdam! overall amazing place! :)

Name: Wheels Cafe
Review Text: The egg super grill sandwich is suuuuper cute yet delicious.  Staff was very friendly too.

Name: Wheels Cafe
Review Text: I had ham and cheese omelette.. it was nice and the portion was huge. But prepare cash as they donâ€™t accept credit card!!! Lol rare

Name: Wheels Cafe
Review Text: Lovely little find! Chris was a brilliant host - very friendly. Burgers and bacon were fantastic and his motherâ€™s brownie was delicious. Pop in if youâ€™re looking for a quick lunch or coffee and cake, come here!

Name: Wheels Cafe
Review Text:
The best kept secret in Amsterdam. The sarnies are a joy and the coffee was excellent. The staff make you feel welcome. A must if you are in the area. Pass by and you will miss out.
Ps I am not related to any of the staff.

Name: Wheels Cafe
Review Text: Very pleasant manager and bar staff, made us feel very welcome, especially as we didn't speak any Dutch, and we were greeted with wellspoken English! Food was decent, not much for your money but it's the same for the area, atmosphere was â€¦

Name: Wheels Cafe
Review Text: A lovely pub cafe with nice outdoor sitting to people watch at the 9 Streets. My Cappucino was however kinda scorched. The burgers looked good and was not too pricey. But FYI, there is no wifi.

Name: Wheels Cafe
Review Text: What an amazing place! We really enjoyed staying here for several beers, and the staff was amazing as well. They were really funny and attentive. I would definitely recommend this place to anyone!

Name: Wheels Cafe
Review Text: I have been in the place some months ago and I had a terrific homemade hamburguer. Today I went to the place in order to bring back to life those good memories. I remembered a high quality hamburguer with excellent meat. â€¦

Name: Wheels Cafe
Review Text: Food is good, the service is horrible though. Owner of the place was impatient when taking orders, there's no way to use a credit card and when we complained about it, they acted annoyed about us not knowing. Wouldn't really recommend this place and I would never visit again.

Name: Wheels Cafe
Review Text: Nice traditional small place. Tasty Food, homemade burgers, toasts, omelettes,.. Good, dogfriendly Service, speaks Englisch and German.

Name: Wheels Cafe
Review Text: incredible service, incredible drinks, perfect environment. the staff was super friendly. highly recommend.

Name: Wheels Cafe
Review Text: Nice cafÃ©. Only place I've ever been to where a large beer is more expensive than 2 small beers (same quantity)

Name: Wheels Cafe
Review Text: My new favourite place in Amsterdam. Friendly staff, good drinks. Fantasic location for sitting outside

Name: Wheels Cafe
Review Text: Super friendly staff good coffee and food. Recommended if you are in Amsterdam passing by.

Name: Wheels Cafe
Review Text: Amazing Food, amazing service and lovely caring staff. Will definitely be coming again when I next visit Amsterdam.

Name: Wheels Cafe
Review Text: Lovely bar. Nice bar snacks and reasonably priced drinks in a lovely area of Amsterdam.

Name: Wheels Cafe
Review Text: Lovely little cafe, good beer selection very reasonably priced and service was lovely!
